projects.title: CarMax Motokaa Shop
projects.description: Motokaa is a web application allows users to browse and search for cars available at CarMax. It provides a user-friendly interface for finding and comparing vehicles based on various criteria such as make, model, price, mileage, and more. The application integrates with the Goonet API to fetch and parse car data, which is then stored in a PostgreSQL database. The project also includes a backend component built with Python/FastAPI, RabbitMQ, and SQLite for handling authentication and data synchronization.

projects.title: Kamident Clinic
projects.description: Kamident Clinic is a web site for dental patients to easily access and book their dental appointments. Kamident also presents the work previously done by the dentist and is able to convince web visitors to make the same dental appointments. The dentist can quickly communicate with clinics on such a platform hence multiplying revenue sources.

projects.title: Joke Simulator
projects.description: In this React App, I use an API to throw random jokes to users. It is intended to make users laugh at their mistakes and keep going even when things get tough. Also I figured why not show off my React skills. Jokes Simulator was created in a bid to make the world a happier place by sharing and spreading joy through jokes. Built With: Tech Stack: Build With: React.js,CSS,JavaScript,JSX, Key Features: Display Jokes per interface, Navigate through the app

projects.title: Extenders Charity Foundation
projects.description: Our project, built on Next.js, focuses on providing support to underprivileged children by visiting their homes and offering various kinds of assistance. Our aim is to improve their living conditions, health, and education, and we believe that every child deserves a chance to thrive regardless of their background.

projects.title: React Devs 254
projects.description: ReactDevs254 is a community that aims to bring together developers, designers, and enthusiasts to share knowledge and insights about React and related technologies. Our website is being built using React and other modern tools, and its open-source. We believe that by collaborating and learning together, we can build better applications and improve the web development industry as a whole.
